UITestFramework

Class MBReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • UITestFramework.MBReporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MobiKwikScreen

    public class MBReporter
extends java.lang.Object
    All the validation methods and method to take screenshot are defined in this class. MobikwikScreen class extends this class.

      • verifyEquals

        public void verifyEquals(java.lang.Object actual,
                         java.lang.Object expected,
                         java.lang.String message,
                         boolean screenshotOnFailure,
                         boolean exitOnFailure)
        method to verify the actual value with expected value
        Parameters:
        actual - actual text displayed
        expected - expected text to be displayed
        message - message should be displayed on failure of assertion
        screenshotOnFailure - pass true if screenshot should be taken on failure else false
        exitOnFailure - pass true if program execution should halt on failure of the condition else false
